messages.subject: Re:Thanks to Andrea The Dire Consequence (TM) of letting children eat too much candy
messages.msgSnippet: Andrea,   I can t thank you enough for your wisdom on this matter. My son is diagnosed with Aspergers Syndrome(on the autism spectrum) and I dreaded all the
messages.messageBody:
Andrea,
 
I can't thank you enough for your wisdom on this matter. My son is diagnosed with Aspergers Syndrome(on the autism spectrum) and I dreaded all the times I was approached by others about considering these dietary restrictions. It is so popular that I found myself doubting my own instincts that where telling me not to restrict. All the hype about GFCG would have you think that those of us who don't buy into it are just lazy parents. Having the freedom to enjoy this life without others trying to control any of it is for my son and I what unschooling is all about.
 
Thank you again Andrea for helping me lift one more burden off of my shoulders so that I can take that energy and put it towards my wonderfully "spirited" son .
 
Be free,
 
Mary
 
 




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
